meanings.sent1: She outtravelled her friends on the hike.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outtravelled his competitors in the race.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outtravelled the hare in the marathon.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outtravelled any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship outtravelled all previous speed records.

meanings.definition: To have traveled farther than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He outtravelled his brother on the road trip.
meanings.sent2: The explorer outtravelled the other adventurers in the expedition.
meanings.sent3: The snail outtravelled the slug in the garden race.
meanings.sent4: Her car outtravelled all the other vehicles on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The migrating birds outtravelled their usual route this year.
